coded_answer.p: I'm writing to you to give my opinion of that great festival you organicedorganised the last 21 and 22 of November.

I want you to know howwhat an extraordinary momentstime I passedhad with my friends inat the festival. Your work was brilliant because you brought stars and artists from around the world withfor only that reasonablereasonably-pricedreasonably priced ticket we paidbought for all thethe whole weekend. The festival was very well organicedorganised with a lot of alternatives like concerts and dance shows. On my point of viewIn my opinion the hall offor the rock concetsconcerts was too small, you'veyou have. You have to consider makemakingbooking a bigbigger one for the next year because these kindkinds of events are concurredattended by a lot of young people. In conclusion, I wanted to say thanks for such ana special weekend.
Thanks for your letter. I got it a couple of days ago and I've been thinking about what you said. I'm going to tell you what I feel.

In my house rules practically don't exist because I haveam 18 years old now so my parentsparents' only wish is that I study for a carrearcareeruniversity degree and be a good man. They only want to know where I am and when I go out and at what time I came home. At school it is completecompletely different because the teachers don't foregiveforgive you nothinganything. You have to be quiet anand attentionattentive in class if you wouldn'tdon't want to be punished. I'm happy because my parents allow me to do a lot of things. I wouldn't like to change anything because we all need some diciplinediscipline to makedo the right things.
When I'dI've time I will write to you again,
